content.body: sure, it'd just likely mean that each meeting is only half-effective, with only a few overlappers :-/

content.body: for things like this is usually like to use whenisgood.net, and then everyone can put in their times, and we can make a more informed decision - with doodles the creator gets to artificially restrict the options from the start
